description: Spectrus is a spectroscopic analysis program that allows scientists to import data they've gathered from spectrometers and other spectroscopic instruments. Scientists can then process, manipulate, and save the data they've imported.

Each Spectrus dataset is saved as a SPECTRUS file. SPECTRUS files typically contain multiple types of spectroscopic data, including chromatography, curves, mass spectrometry, NMR, optical, and structure drawing data.
